admission_text:
[__Home](/)

# Tickets

###### Gallery Closure

The Egypt Galleries are closed for renovation.

You can still see more than 200 Egyptian artifacts in [_Ancient Egypt: From Discovery to Display_](/on-view/galleries-exhibitions/ancient-egypt) and throughout the Museum. Ask for our Explore Egypt guides at the Welcome Desk.

#### Admission Pricing

Every ticket purchase supports our mission to make archaeology and anthropology accessible to all. Explore other ways to save on Museum Admission.

FREE  | Penn Museum Members | [Join Today __](/join-give/membership)  
---|---|---  
$23 | Adult   
$21  | Senior (65 and over)   
$14 | Youth (6-17) and College Student  
FREE  | Children (5 and under)   
FREE  | Penn Faculty, Staff, and Student  
FREE  | ACCESS/EBT Card Holders | Walk-up only  
FREE  | Active U.S. military personnel and veterans | Walk-up only  
FREE  | K-12 Teachers | Walk-up only  
FREE  | Penn Medicine/CHOP patients and staff | Walk-up only or online with code  
FREE  | Philadelphia high-school students (with ID) through [STAMP](https://www.art-reach.org/programs/stamp) | Walk-up only  
  
__
